What María Eugenia most likes about Fondo Esperanza is that it provides the opportunity to acquire a loan which can be invested in her business; in addition, the companionship from the group and the training from the advisor.

Pudahuel is a commune in the west of metropolitan Santiago (capital of Chile).  In the Mapudungun (indigenous Mapuche language) it means “place where the waters come together” or “place of puddles,” because it has a varied web of waterways made up of the Mapucho River, the Lampa, Carén and Las Cruces marshes which make its land suitable for farming thanks to the abundance of subterranean water.

loans.use: For a sewing machine, thread, pearls and hooks.

loans.name: Book Jom Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité BOOK JOM est créé depuis un an et demi. Il est composé de 25 femmes qui sont du même village. Elle se sont regroupées par voisinage et par affinité. Le petit commerce est leur activité principale. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de THIEO ADI

Madame Jeanne D. debout à l'extrême droite de la photo, levant la main, est responsable du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Elle a aussi la charge de deux autres enfants qui lui sont confiés par des parents. 

Elle développe une activité de petit commerce. Elle vend des tissus. Son nouveau crédit lui permettra de renforcer son activité en augmentant son niveau d'approvisionnement.

Avec les bénéfices qu'elle réalise à partir de son activité elle paye de cours de renforcement pour son fils qui se prépare à faire un exement. Elle participe également à la prise en charge de certaines dépenses de la famille
texts.en:
The solidarity group Book Jom was created a year and half ago. It is made up of 25 women who come from the same town. They formed the group through neighbourhood and social connections. Their main activity involves running small businesses. The group belongs to the Village Loan Group of Thieo Adi.

Ms. Jeanne D., standing all the way on the right in the photo with the raised hand, is responsible for the group. She is married and has two children. She also has two other children in her care, who were entrusted to her by their parents.

She has developed a small business selling fabric. Her new loan will allow her to strengthen her business by raising her ability to buy supplies.

With the profits that she draws from her business, she pays for a review course for her son, who is preparing for an exam. She also contributes to paying for certain household expenses.

loans.use: To buy fabric for resale

loans.name: Bertha Adilia

texts.es:
Bertha es una pequeña comerciante, de venta de ropa, zapato, habiendo establecido su negocio hace doce años, con pequeñas compras de mercadería, ahora aumentando sus ventas gracias a los préstamos que Afodenic ha otorgado en dos ciclos.
Parte de su mercadería la compra en un mercado a proveedores en donde las adquiere a mejor precio, para dar precios accesibles a sus clientes.
Con este nuevo préstamo comprara uniformes para damas y caballeros, calcetas, zapatos, que es lo que mas esta siendo demandado por el curso de año entrante. Lo que está contenta por apoyar a su familia con los gastos ya que también tiene los gastos de sus tres hijos que cursan sus estudios.
texts.en:
Bertha is a small businesswoman who sells clothing and shoes. She started her business twelve years ago by making small purchases of merchandise. Now she has increased her sales as a result of the funding she has received from AFODENIC for the past two loan cycles.

Bertha acquires part of her merchandise from the suppliers market where she can get the best price, which enables her to pass on the savings to her customers. With this new loan she will buy uniforms for women and men, socks, and shoes since these items are more in demand for the upcoming year. Bertha is happy to be supporting her family with the expenses as well as the cost of sending her three children to school.

loans.use: Purchase uniforms, socks, and shoes to sell

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Mrs. Ana is 50 years old, and she owns a local clothing apparel store. She is married, and her husband is a builder. Both get a lot of business. Thanks to the loan granted by Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva, this lady invested her profits in the purchase of goods for the garment industry, thus achieving a higher income in sales.

She has a market, nationally and internationally, making clothing, especially sportswear (T-shirts, etc.) of very good quality and at a good price.

Today, Mrs. Ana has improved her revenue and her customers are increasingly satisfied with the excellent care she provides in the shop. This client thanks the Paraguayan Foundation  for supporting new clients so they can operate, using Kiva funds to help them earn a better income.

loans.use: Buying fabrics

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.en:
This client is a merchant, dedicated to the purchase and sale of perfume and colognes, and has clientele across the country.

Mr. Cirilo is single and has no children, but is currently living as a couple with a teacher who is taking out the loan with him. He is a very hard worker and has very good references in society.

He thanks the Institution for its good service and he agrees to comply in a timely manner with the responsibility assumed with the company.

loans.use: Buying perfume and cologne

loans.name: Sergio De  Jesus

texts.es:
Sergio, de 48 años de edad ,originario de la comarca  el Dorado , municipio de Estelí, casado, con 5 hijos a su cargo, de oficio  agricultor, tiene 40 años dedicándose a la actividad de siembra de hortalizas ,solo llego hasta tercer  grado de primaria ,pues debido a su procedencia humilde , el tener estudios era algo difícil para sus padres  así que  se dedico a trabajar con su padre en la siembra  pues fue su papa  quien le enseño a sembrar.Al cumplir los 15 años   ya sembraba por cuenta propia, se caso a los 22 años .  A partir de entonces sembraba hortalizas , comenzó con tomate y cebolla  en su comunidad. Fruto de su labor logro comprar su propio   equipo   de trabajo  y su vivienda. Actualmente siembra a medias con su suegro una parte de la cosecha  de cebolla. Además  también tiene otros ingresos como el destace de cerdo actividad que hace cada 5 días dentro de su misma comunidad.
Solicita el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de insumos y semilla de tomate. El crédito le permitirá obtener mayor ganancia, mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y ser un productor conocido ,poderlo exportar  a Costa Rica .
texts.en: Sergio is 48 years old, originally from the Dorado region in the town of Estelí. He is married with five dependent children. He has worked as a trade farmer for 40 years growing vegetables. He only studied until 3rd grade, due to his humble origin. Continuing his studies was difficult for his parents so he dedicated himself to working with his father in planting because it was his father who taught him to sow. When he was 15 years old he was already sowing for himself and married when he was 22 years old. After having planted vegetables, from then on he started with tomatoes and onions in his community. The fruits of his labor are buying his own home and having his own team of workers. Currently he is planting half with his father, part of the onion harvest. In addition he earns other means of income doing pig butchering every 5 days in the same community. He is requesting a loan to invest in buying more raw materials and tomato seeds. The loan will allow him to have better earnings, improve his family's quality of life and be a well known producer, allowing him to export to Costa Rica.

loans.use: To buy raw materials and tomato seeds.

loans.name: Livia Blanca Ramona

texts.en:
Ms. Livia Blanca Ramona H. D. R. owns a small bookstore where she sells office supplies and has a photocopy machine. She's been with the Foundation since 2008.

Ms. Livia says that thanks to the credit given, she was able to expand the merchandise of her business, so she could proviD. a better life to her family.

She is very thankful to the Foundation for help provided because it helped her in not only economic matters, but also in self-esteem and skill development.

loans.use: buying office supplies (paper, pens, rulers, etc)

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Don Luis de 31 años de edad, se dedica a sembrar granos básicos y elaborar dulce de panela, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, donde vive con su familia, su esposa Rosa y cuatro hijos Carlos de 16 años, José de 14, René de 13 y Luis de 10 años de edad. El trabajo de Luis es la agricultura realizándola todos los días ya sean realizando labores con el cultivo de maíz, frijol, maicillo y en la temporada de trapiche de donde obtiene el dulce de panela, este oficio fue herencia de sus padres.
El necesita invertir en la actividad de la molienda, por lo que solicita un préstamo para llevar a cabo todo el proceso, ya que esta temporada necesita pagar mano de obra pues él solo no puede realizar el trabajo de la molienda.
Sueña con seguir en su trabajo pues es algo que le agrada realizar, pero espera que los frutos de este trabajo se reflejen en sus hijos, avanzando en sus estudios y siendo profesionales en un futuro.
texts.en:
Luis, 31, plants basic grains and makes “dulce de panela” (sweet made from sugar cane).   He lives in Corinto, Morazán department, with his family, his wife, Rosa, and four children: Carlos, 16, José, 14, René, 13 and Luis, 10.

Luis works in agriculture daily in chores related to corn, beans and sorghum and during the sugar cane grinding season he obtains the dulce de panela; this line of work was passed down to him by his parents.

He needs to invest in the sugar cane grinding activity.  He asked for a loan to accomplish the entire process because during this season he has to pay labor costs because he can’t manage the grinding by himself.

He dreams with staying in business because it’s something he enjoys but he hopes that the fruits of his labors will be reflected in his children as they advance in their studies becoming professionals in the future.

loans.use: To pay labor costs for the process of sugar cane grinding.

loans.name: Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Lilian, de 40 años de edad, reside en Lolotique departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y cuatro hijos de 20, 18, 14 y 3 años de edad, los cuales dependen económicamente.
Doña Lilian administra una tienda hace 12 años, por iniciativa propia, trabajando de lunes a domingo, no tiene un horario de venta pues la tiene en su propia casa, Ella está solicitando un préstamo para invertir en este negocio, comprando: Maíz, arroz, frijol, azúcar, aceite, sopas, verduras, pollo, bebidas entre otros que a diario vende  a sus clientes.
Este préstamo le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio ya que lograra abastecerlo de todo lo necesario en el hogar, ya que son los más demandados por los clientes. Sus aspiraciones es continuar aumentando el negocio, que sus hijos terminen sus estudios para que opten por un futuro más estable.
texts.en:
Doña Lilian is 40 years old and resides in Lolotique in the Department of San Miguel. She lives with her husband and their four children (ages 20, 18, 14, and 3) who are financial dependents.

Doña Lilian has managed a store for twelve years through her own initiative. She works Monday through Sunday, but she does not have a set schedule since she sells out of her home. Lilian is requesting a loan to invest in her business. She will buy corn, rice, sugar, oil, soups, vegetables, chicken, beverages and other items she sells every day to her customers.

This loan will help strengthen her business by allowing her to remain stocked with all types of household necessities that are most requested by her customers. Her aspirations include continuing to increase her business so that her children can finish their studies. She believes this will give them the chance to have a more stable future.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her store

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es: Luis Carlos tiene 23 años.es una persona muy responsable pues ha sido un buen cliente. La actividad económica de Luis es la venta de pollo. El dio inicio hace más de 3 años, pues era su único medio de ingreso ya que tenía que proporcionarle el pan de cada día. Y Logro salir adelante, Luis es un hombre muy luchador y que le gusta el trabajo duro. Por lo que el financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de pechuga, piernas, muslos entre otras partes del pollo. Sueña con proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
23-year old Luis Carlos is a very responsible person who has been a good client [of our institution]. He makes his living by selling chickens. He started this work more than three years ago--it was his only income and he had to do something to support himself each day. He managed to make a success of his venture; Luis is a fighter and he likes to work hard.

The loan he is now seeking is to buy chicken breasts, legs, and thighs etc. His dream is to make improvements to his house.

loans.use: to buy more chicken pieces

loans.name: Hugo Enrique

texts.es:
Hugo de 26 años de edad, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, se dedica a criar cerdos y posee una tienda, él vive con su esposa Luisa y tienen una hija de 3 años de edad. El negocio tiene 4 años  de existir, lo atiende de 7:00am a 8:00pm,  la crianza de cerdos es un oficio que aprendió junto a sus padres.
El está solicitando un préstamo para surtir la tienda y también quiere comprar cerditos, este préstamo será una gran ayuda para mejorar el negocio y adquirir más cerdos para crecerlos, espera ir superando las dificultades económicas y que su situación sea mejor cada día.
Los objetivos de Hugo es seguir invirtiendo en el negocio, ya que de él depende su familia para los cuales desea darles lo mejor.
texts.en:
Hugo is 26 years old and resides in Corinto in the Department of Morazán. He raises pigs and manages a store. Hugo lives with his wife Luisa and their three year old daughter. His business has been in existence for four years and he manages it from 7am to 8pm. Raising pigs is a trade he learned from his parents.

Hugo is requesting a loan to restock his store, but he also wants to buy piglets. This loan will be a great help in improving his business and acquiring more pigs to raise. He hopes to overcome his financial difficulties and improve his situation each day. One of his goals is to continue investing in his business since he relies on it so that he can provide his family the best.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for his store & acquire piglets

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is divorced with two children. She sells women's clothing at the Ivano-Frankivsk open market. Irina has been in this business for 15 years. She has two business locations and one employee. This business is the only source of income for Irina and her children.

Irina would like to borrow 10,000 UAH to increase the variety of clothing she stocks. She hopes to increase sales and make additional income. Irina's goal is to save enough money to help her children enroll in college.

loans.use: To increase her variety of stock.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
Ismael hombre trabajador, casado su esposa de profesión docente,  agricultor planes mejora poco a poco su nivel de vida y mejor su finca. Se le presenta dificultades como son el alza de los precios de los insumos.
El préstamo que solicitad ser invertido en la compra de Compra de semillas, alambre, postes, fertilizantes y exfoliantes. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su finca.
texts.en:
Ismael is married and a hardworking gentleman.  His wife is a teacher by profession.  Ismael is a farmer who has plans to gradually improve his standard of living as well as his farm.  Among the difficulties he faces are price increases of his supplies.

The loan he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of seeds, wire, poles, fertilizers, and defoliants.  He is grateful for the financial support so that he can develop his farm.

loans.use: Purchase farming supplies

loans.name: Madres Activas Group

texts.en:
This committee was formed on September 16th, 2008, on the initiative of Ms. Carolina Velazco (a former member).  The group was formed thanks to the overwhelming desire of its members.  

The members of this group are investing the loan they receive into buying fruits, vegetables, clothing, soft drinks, articles of jewelry, bread and meat to resell in their businesses.  All of the members of the committee say they are happy with the given credit because they will be able to improve their lives.

Mrs. Delcida is the chairwoman of this committee.  She has a small general store which sells everything.  But it costs a lot of money to stock the store to supply the needs of her customers, so she applied for a loan because believes that with this investment she can progress.

loans.use: To purchase products to resell

loans.name: Noemy Esperanza

texts.es:
La señora Noemy Esperanza Z. tiene 53 años de edad, vive en la colonia Morazan.
Tiene casa propia y se dedica a la venta de golosinas, desayunos, almuerzos y cenas. su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de alimentos para la preparacion de sus sabrosas comidas y tambien necesita comprar platos, vasos y mesas plasticas para reemplazar algunas que ya estan quebradas.
gracias a su negocio a logrado darles los estudios a sus hijas y su mayor deseo es tener a sus dos hijas graduadas de la universidad, nos comento que una vez que logre su meta con sus hijas podra invertir mas en su negocio y hacerlo mas grande y mas bonito para dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
53-year old Señora Noemy Esperanza Z. lives in the Morazan neighbourhood. She owns a house and earns her living by selling candy, breakfasts, lunches, and dinners from her home. She is seeking a loan to buy ingredients for her delicious food, and she also needs to buy plates, glasses, and plastic tables to replace her old broken ones. 

With the income from her business she has managed to educate her daughters, and her greatest wish is to see them graduate from university. Noemy explains that once this goal has been achieved, she will be able to invest more money in her business. Her plan is to expand and renovate it, and thus provide her customers with better service.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients, dishes etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs and pay workers to help at harvest time

loans.name: Petrona De Los Angeles

texts.es: Petrona De Los Ángeles tiene 57 años, ella tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundación León 2000 por lo que su record crediticio es muy bueno.  Es una mujer viuda. La actividad económica de Petrona es brindar el servicio de molino. Hace más de 15 años que se dedica a esta actividad económica. Los problemas que ha enfrentado Petrona son de salud ya que debido a su edad es muy difícil tener la agilidad para servir a sus clientes, pero esto no le impide el seguir adelante. Siempre se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma con sus clientes. El financiamiento es destinado para capital de trabajo para proporcionarle mantenimiento a su molino. Su deseo es mejorar su salud para continuar con el negocio.
texts.en:
Petrona De Los Ángeles, 57, has been collaborating with Fundación León 2000 for a long time so her credit history is very good.  She is a widow and her economic activity is providing milling services.

She’s been in this line of work for over 15 years.  The problems Petrona has faced are health related because due to her age it’s more difficult to have the agility needed to serve her customers but this doesn’t impede her continuing forward.  She has always been characterized with great charisma towards her customers.

She will use this loan as working capital to provide maintenance to her mill.  Her wish is that her health improves so that she can continue in business.

loans.use: For mill maintenance.

loans.name: Deysi

texts.es:
La señora Deisy A. tiene 58 años de edad, esta casada con el señor Ezequiel Ordoñez y no tienen hijos que dependan de ellos.
Deysi vive con su esposo y se dedica a la venta productos varios como ser: harina, huevos, papas, platanos, manteca, aceite, leche, azucar, carne de res, cerdo y pollos.
tambien tiene un puesto de venta de golosinas en el mercado viejo, emplea a dos personas que le ayudan con la fabricacion de las comidas y la atencion a los clientes, en el negocio de comidas vende tacos, enchiladas, baleadas, tortillas con quesillo, platanos fritos con frijoles, arroz con Pollo, jugos naturales, y refrescos de botella.
 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio.
Su meta a corto plazo es montar un nuevo negocio para tener mas utilidades.
texts.en:
Mrs. Deisy A., 58, is married to Mr. Ezequiel Ordoñez; they have no dependent children.

Deisy lives with her husband and sells various products like: flour, eggs, potatoes, bananas, lard, oil, milk, sugar, beef, pork and chickens.

She also has a stand in the old market selling sweets.  She hires two people who help her prepare meals and tend to customers.  In the food business she sells tacos, enchiladas, baleadas (tortilla stuffed with beans), tortillas with cheese, fried bananas with beans, chicken and rice, natural fruit juices and bottled soft drinks.

She will use the loan to buy groceries to stock her store.  Her short term goal is to set up a new business to have more profits.

loans.use: To buy stock items for the store.

loans.name: Veronica Elizabeth

texts.es:
Verónica, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, tiene 27 años de edad, su familia está conformada por su esposo José Israel  y sus cuatro hijos: Kevin de 9 años, Merari de 6 años, Josué Ariel de 4 años y José de 1 año de edad, todos son dependientes. Verónica y su esposo se dedican a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 2 años, esta idea nace por la necesidad de trabajar y tener dinero para cubrir los gastos de sus hijos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar frutas y verduras, las cuales adquiere en el mercado de San Miguel, con los fondos del préstamo quiere surtir y mejorar el negocio, los únicos riesgos es los cambios de precio que existen a diario en la mercadería.
Las aspiraciones de ella es trabajar diariamente por mejorar la atención y el servicio a los clientes, también velar por su hogar y las necesidades, apoyando a sus hijos en el estudio.
texts.en:
Verónica lives in Corinto, Morazán department.  She is 27 years old and her family is made up of her husband, José Israel, and their four dependent children: Kevin, 9, Merari, 6, Josué Daniel, 4 and José, 1. Verónica and her husband have been selling fruit and vegetables for the last two years.  This idea arose out of the need to work and have income to cover their children’s expenses.

She is asking for a loan to buy fruit and vegetables that she gets in San Miguel’s market.  She wants to use the funds from the loan to stock and improve the business.  The only risks are the daily price fluctuations of the merchandise.

Her dream is to work daily to improve customer service and to watch over her home and needs supporting her children’s schooling.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Felix Armando

texts.es:
Felix es un pequeño comerciante dedicado a las ventas de muebles y electrodoméstico, vendiendo al contado y al crédito, iniciando hace diez años, con una variedad de productos, en la venta de madera, alquiler de tierra y ahora vendiendo electrodomésticos.
Es atreves de Afodenic que comienza a invertir en  más productos al otorgarle un financiamiento el cual logra aumentar sus ventas. En inventario no tiene productos ya que entrego todos sus pedidos ahora, con este nuevo préstamo  comprara cuatro camas de madera matrimonial, dos muebles de madera para tv. Logrando vender a buen precio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Felix is a small businessman who sells furniture and household appliances for cash and on credit. He started this business ten years ago with a variety of products. Felix sold wood and rented out land, but now he sells appliances.

He hopes to receive a loan from AFODENIC so that he can invest in more products to increase his sales. Felix has no products in his inventory since they were all sold to fulfill orders. With this new loan, he will buy four wooden double beds and two wooden TV stands. This will enable him to sell to his customers at a good price.

loans.use: Purchase wood furniture to sell

loans.name: Lupita I Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en casa D. L. señora María Luisa H., un integrante del grupo Lupita 1, que esta ubicado en el Estado D. VeraC., en México, L. señora Maria Luisa H es integrante del grupo. ElL. se dedica a L. venta D. ropa, mochilas y zapatos, que inicio hace 2 años. Solicita el préstamo para invertir en mercancia para su negocio D. ropa. Los clientes L. conocen como una persona responsable y trabajadora. Al momento D. solicitar este préstamo se siente muy satisfecha ya que por medio D. este préstamo podrá incrementar sus ventas y tener más clientes. ElL. tiene 34 años, estudió hasta el nivel medio superior, vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo varon. También espera ser L. mejor D. L. zona en ventas. Quiere ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida y seguir apoyando a su hijo con sus estudios hasta llegar a darle una profesión. Braulia Z., es L. presidenta del grupo. Tiene 34 años, estudió hasta L. preparatoria, vive en unión libre y tiene en total 2 hijos; una niña y un niño, elL. se dedica  a L. venta D. antojitos que inicio hace 1 año. Solicita el préstamo para comprara mas insumos para su negocio y D. esta manera tener más variedad y así mismo obtener más clientes.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in the house of María Luisa H., a member of the group Lupita 1, located in the state of VeraC., México. María Luisa sells clothing, backpacks, and shoes, a business activity she began two years ago. She is requesting a loan to invest in merchandise for her clothing business. Her customers know her as a responsible and hardworking person. She is pleased to use this loan opportunity to increase her sales and customers and hopes to be the best salesperson in the area. She is 34 years old and attended school through her pre-college studies. She and her partner have a son together. María Luisa wants to offer her family a better quality of life and to be able to support her son's schooling until he is able to have a professional career. 

Braulia Z. is the group's president. She is 34 years old, has a high school education and has two children, one girl and one boy, with her partner. She sells snack food, a business she started a year ago. She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her business to be able to offer more variety and thus attract more customers.

loans.use: Purchase of clothing

loans.name: Ada Ruth

texts.es:
La señora Ada Ruth H. tiene 46 años de edad, vive en el barrio el Mangallano de la ciudad de San Lorenzo y se dedica a la venta de refrescos en diferentes tamaños.
Ada es madre de cuatro hijos y esta casada con el señor Marco Antonio Rodas.
tiene 15 años de vivir en dicho lugar y dos de sus hijos ya se graduaron y los otros dos continuan estudiando.
su esposo le ayuda a cubrir los gastos del hogar.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de refrescos al por mayor ya que en esta epoca se vende mucho el refresco helado debido al gran calor que se mantiene en la zona.
 
Ada es una mujer tranquila, responsable y con deseos de salir adelante.
en un futuro desea remodelar su negocio y comprar mas freezers o refrigeradoras para tener mas ganancias.
texts.en:
Ms. Ada Ruth H. is 46 years old. She lives in the Mangallano neighborhood in the city of San Lorenzo. She works selling soda of various sizes. Ada is a mother to 4 children and is married to Mr. Marco Antonio Rodas. She has lived in the same place for 15 years and two of their children have already graduated and the other two are continuing their studies. 

Her husband helps cover the home expenses. She will use the loan to buy wholesale soft drinks since at this time much soda is sold frozen because of the great heat that remains in the area.

Ada is a very laid back woman who is responsible and wants to succeed. In the future she wants to remodel her business and buy more freezers or refrigerators to earn a greater income.

loans.use: To buy wholesale soft drinks of different sizes: 1/2, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5 and 3 liters

loans.name: Felix Manuel

texts.es: Félix Manuel tiene 1 hijo que asiste a un colegio público, ya que no tiene los suficientes ingresos para mantenerlos en un privado. Su actividad económica es brindar el servicio de pintura y soldadura, que está ubicada de manera ambulante. Inicio este medio de vida por su Padre quien le enseño este negocio, para que el pudiera mantenerse. Ahora está solicitando un financiamiento que será utilizado para la compra de materiales. Félix tiene el sueño de incrementar su negocio para que el día de mañana esto le asegure el futuro a su hijo.
texts.en: Félix Manuel has one son who is in public school. He does not earn enough of an income to send him to private school. He works as a street vendor and  provides a paint and welding service. He started doing this through his father who taught him the business so that he could support himself. Now he is requesting a loan that he will use to purchase materials. Félix has a dream to expand his business so that one day he can assure his child's future.

loans.use: Working capital
